function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases in struggling economies and highly infected countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of multiple sectors to the impacts of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on health in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to adapt to new regulations and guidelines","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disaster and emergency management practices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divergence in opinions of different groups of experts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Convergence without consensus","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of the expert-led approach for selection and identification","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey participants with less than 3 years of experience may lack the necessary expertise to provide accurate and reliable opinions and suggestions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent opinions and suggestions due to varying levels of experience among the participants.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias towards the opinions and suggestions of participants with longer experience, leading to the neglect of valuable input from less experienced participants.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulated weighting analysis process involving 25 participants from each field","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Involving a large number of individuals in the decision-making process may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases, especially during in-person meetings or consultations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of likert rating system involving 25 participants may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases if gathering in person.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participant engagement conducted online may introduce bias in the selection and recommendation stages.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development in the sectors of construction and the built environment may lead to inadequate consideration of contagious disease propagation risk.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate weighting of factors against primary cbe areas may result in misaligned development priorities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in off-site construction may lead to a higher risk of contagious diseases transmission due to transportation of materials and workers from various locations.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid shelter construction and emergency constructions may lead to overcrowding and inadequate ventilation, increasing the risk of airborne contagious diseases transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for lightweight buildings and structural systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptive methods leading to less compact working environments and more individual allocated spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne virus transmission due to poor sound-proof protection and insulation in multi-storey buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of high population density on the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes to density considerations and urban layouts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive measures in spatial planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major changes to internal layouts of public buildings and commercial spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent measures across different building typologies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to community-level safety and prevention strategies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of attention to green spaces and communal areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on industry suggestions over scholarly research","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential development changes in construction and built environment sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expected economic impacts leading to new paradigms in engineering and design of built environments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to population density and compact design in built environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to sudden policy changes impacting built environment development.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gradual development of new practices and perspectives leading to changes in built environment design and construction.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person teaching conferences, morbidity and mortality conferences, and simulation labs are being avoided due to the covid-19 pandemic, leading to a decrease in resident case volume.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The american college of surgeons and government institutions recommending against the continuation of elective surgery, with most facilities minimizing participants in any operation to essential personnel only.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of a closed facebook group for educational purposes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing flipped classroom technique for conferences","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Institution of separate tracks for junior and senior residents","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of teleconference software may risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Some faculty struggling with novel technology and poor bandwidth connections for participants","category":"Technological
